summary: This bill, the Colleges for the American People Act of 2025 (CAP Act of 2025), introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to repeal a section of the Immigration and Nationality Act. Specifically, it seeks to repeal section 214(g)(5)(A) concerning numerical limitations related to employees of institutions of higher education. The bill was introduced by Mr. Tiffany and Mr. Clyde and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
